amendment.description: Amendment provides such sums as are necessary to carry out the study authorized in section 6002 of the Water Resources Reform and Development Act of 2014.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to provide such sums as are necessary to carry out the study authorized in section 6002 of the Water Resources Reform and Development Act of 2014.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lankford amendment (A010) Agreed to by voice vote.
